title: AVONDALE @ Bellmar Modern Luxury Apts !!!!
app_fee: $50 APPLICATION FEE PER PERSON $200 ADMINISTRATION FEE
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Your New Home Awaits.', "Avondale at Bellmar is located in the heart of North Dallas and surrounded by some of the city's greatest attractions.", 'Virtual Tour: <URL>', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'Today', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Knightvest Communities are pet friendly communities.', 'We implement a 2 pet limit per apartment home.', 'The following policy is in place to assist in maintaining a healthy and attractive community.', 'Please contact the Management office in the event you have any questions concerning this policy.', 'NOT APPROVED - but not limited to:- Pit Bull Terriers - Staffordshire Terriers - Rottweilers- German Shepherd - Presa Canarios - Chows Chows- Doberman Pinschers - Akitas - Wolf-hybrids-', 'Mastiffs - Cane Corsos - Great Danes- Alaskan Malamutes - Siberian HuskiesIncluding any mix of the breeds listed above.', 'Deposit:', '0', 'Leasing options:', '3 months,4 months,5 months,6 months,7 months,8 months,9 months,10 months,11 months,12 months,12+ months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Application fee:', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'Laundry:', 'Shared', 'Parking type:', 'On-Street', 'Parking notes:', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Range/Oven', 'Exterior:', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Heat: forced air, Central AC, Air conditioning, Double pane / Storm windows', 'Wiring:', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Shared pool, Fitness center, Clubhouse, Barbecue', 'Security and Access:', 'Views:', 'Additional features:', 'Package Room, Outdoor fitness area, Quartz countertop', 'Offered by:', 'Bellmar North', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
